mapper.update: update po_thumbnail set bucket_name = #{bucketName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, key_name = #{keyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
